items.sentence: It may have happened when Tom was in Boston.
Tom pretended that he knew nothing about it.
Tom is a respected educational psychologist.
Tom brought three bottles of water with him.
Tom burned all the letters he got from Mary.
I\'m the only one here who can speak French.
Tom should\'ve arrived at the office by now.
Tom should\'ve finished his homework by now.
My friends knew I was having money problems.
I\'ll deal with you when I\'m done with Tom.
We were all surprised that Tom won the race.
We were laughed at by everybody in the room.
I\'ll stay a while longer if you want me to.
I\'ll take Tom to the zoo if you want me to.
Tom didn\'t eat the sandwich I made for him.
I told Tom that I wouldn\'t go to Australia.
I told Tom why Mary didn\'t want to do that.
Don\'t you want to know why Tom isn\'t here?
You\'re actually asking two questions there.
Tom didn\'t speak to Mary at all last night.
Tom didn\'t specify how many pencils to buy.
I don\'t know how long the picnic will last.
Tom says that he doesn\'t feel like jogging.
I heard you were planning to move to Boston.
I didn\'t have to tell Tom. He already knew.
Tom will probably tell Mary he\'s not tired.
Let\'s cross that bridge when we come to it.
Tom found it difficult to solve the problem.
Maybe you and I should get something to eat.
I opened the door and held it open for Mary.
I overheard Tom and Mary talking about John.
I can\'t remember how I got home last night.
You need to do whatever Tom tells you to do.
Tom isn\'t the sharpest knife in the drawer.
Tom discovered that he had run out of money.

I want everyone to know about what happened.
Tom may miss his train if he doesn\'t hurry.
You\'re not the only one who has to do that.
Tom has lots of things he needs to be doing.
Tom has made up his mind to go to Australia.
Tom has made up his mind to propose to Mary.
Tom has more than enough money to buy a car.
Tom scratched his back with a backscratcher.
Tom\'s car isn\'t here, so he must\'ve left.
I want my children to have a good education.
Tom\'s office is the third door on the left.
Tom\'s rough manner frightened the children.
Tom needs to get to the hospital right away.
Tom never said anything about what happened.
